price: 52. En de vroegere mensen van het volk van Noeh, waarlijk zij waren onrechtvaardiger en opstandiger.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ هُمۡ أَظۡلَمَ وَأَطۡغَىٰ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū hum aẓlama wa-aṭghā
